headlines.description: — João Félix’s second match for Chelsea went better than his first.
headlines.shortLinkText: João Félix scores 1st Chelsea goal in 1-1 draw with West Ham

headlines.description: Arsenal missed an opportunity to extend their lead at the top of the Premier League table as they were held to a 1-1 draw against Brentford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Toney strike holds Arsenal to draw vs. Brentford

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Crystal Palace

headlines.description: — James Tomkins took advantage of a mistake by Brighton goalkeeper Robert Sanchez to help Crystal Palace draw 1-1 in the English Premier League on Saturday and remain winless this year.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace draw with Brighton 1-1 after goalie mistake in EPL

headlines.description: Goals from Willian and Manor Solomon guided Fulham to a 2-0 victory over Nottingham Forest in their Premier League fixture at Craven Cottage.
headlines.shortLinkText: Willian, Solomon lead Fulham 2-0 win vs. Forest

headlines.description: — Manager Antonio Conte's return to the dugout was a miserable one as his Tottenham was humiliated at Leicester 4-1 in the English Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Conte's return ruined as Tottenham loses at Leicester 4-1

headlines.description: — João Gomes scored in the 87th minute to help 10-man Wolverhampton complete a 2-1 comeback victory over last-placed Southampton in the English Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolverhampton stuns Southampton with 2-1 comeback win

headlines.description: — Miguel Almiron’s 10th goal of the season and a late goalline clearance by Kieran Trippier ensured Newcastle manager Eddie Howe claimed a point on his Bournemouth return in a 1-1 draw in the English Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle held 1-1 by Bournemouth, continues stuttering form
